description: This is the README of the entire project. Here you can find information about folder structure, files and project details.

analyses.description: This folder contains folders and files of the analyses.

data.description: This folder contains raw data of the project.

output.description: This folder contains the different iutputs of the analyses.

tables.description: This folder contains tabular results of the analyses.

plots.description: This folder contains plots of the results of the analyses.

refs.description: This folder contains different references for the projects.

papers.description: This folder contains papers that are useful for this project.

colors.description: This folder contains .csv files that are used for color code for the figures of this project.

script.description: This folder contains scripts that are used in the analyses.

functions.description: This folder contains script of functions that are used in the analyses.
